caption.title: Long-term changes of global GPP and environmental regulations.
caption.p: ( A) Time series of global GPP estimates derived from EC-LUE and MODIS-GPP models. ( B) GPP sensitivity to climate variables, NDVI/fPAR, and atmospheric CO 2 concentration. ( C) Contributions of climate variables, NDVI/fPAR, and atmospheric CO 2 concentration to GPP changes over the two periods. Three climate variables are included: vapor pressure deficit (VPD), air temperature ( T a), and photosynthetically active radiation (PAR).
